subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Wil Nieves beat out Todd Pratt for the backup catcher job, while Josh Phelps took Andy Phillips’s spot at first base and Sean Henn replaced Ron Villone in the bullpen.
snippet: Wil Nieves beat out Todd Pratt for the backup catcher job, while Josh Phelps took Andy Phillips’s spot at first base and Sean Henn replaced Ron Villone in the bullpen.
